data.name: Hex Nail

data.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal self and 2 other allies with the least HP percentage for 12.5% of this unit's max HP
- Each heal-receiving unit heals +2.5% more HP for every 2 negative effect on themselves (max 7.5)
data.name: Hex Nail

data.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal self and 2 other allies with the least HP percentage for 15% of this unit's max HP
- Each heal-receiving unit heals +2.5% more HP for every negative effect on themselves (max 10%)
- At 4+ Envy Reson. including this Skill, heal 1 additional ally

Targets randomly
[EndSkill] Heal 3 other allies with the least HP percentage for 20% of this unit's max HP

passiveList.desc:
When inflicting [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed' against an enemy with Base Attack Skills, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (once per turn)
- If the target has [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed', inflict additional 2 [Laceration] (once per turn)

If an ally, including this unit, takes direct HP damage from the enemy, inflict 1 [Curse] against the target enemy (2 times per turn)
passiveList.name: Iron Stake against the Heart
